content: I need to proove a few Integral Operators are Compact and I am having some trouble, I probably made a mistake somewhere. Are compact sets, integral operators and compact operators implemented in mathlib and lean4 already?
docs#IsCompactOperator and docs#IsCompact, I don't think that we have integral operators, would be an easy thing to add.
Thanks a lot. I checked that docs page many times but dont know why I missed it.
